results: Every March 2nd we celebrate the birthday of Theodor Geisel—you know him as Dr. Seuss. Dr. Seuss is known for his delightful rhymes and stories for kids. But beyond quotes from Dr. Seuss's famous children's books—from Oh, the Places You'll Go! to Green Eggs and Ham—the best Dr. Seuss quotes apply to adults and everyday life, too.The prolific children’s book author was born on March 2, 1904, and his mark on kids’ literature was so indelible, the National Education Association created National Read Across America Day in honor of the day. Dr. Seuss passed away in 1991 at age 87, but new generations of children still learn to read—and learn to flex their imaginations—with his unforgettable characters and rhymes to this day. That’s why we’re marking his life with some of Dr. Seuss' most inspiring quotes—many of which work well as birthday wishes! Some quotes are drawn from his books and others from interviews, but they’re all equally worth remembering.From the best famous Dr. Seuss quotations to Dr. Seuss quotes that encourage you to embrace your individuality to funny Doctor Seuss quotes and sayings that'll make you feel like a kid again, these best Dr. Seuss quotes about life are guaranteed to make your day just a little bit brighter.You'll be familiar with some of these famous Dr. Seuss quotations, while others may be entirely new to you.
